location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād] to Captain Arthur William Roberts

mods.abstract: Letter asking if Roberts can assist in arranging for furniture for tents, asking whether they could borrow a band from the Maharaja and stating that Colonel Macdonald is giving them some bag pipers.The letter goes on to ask about the ground that is being used for the camp and where it is located; and regarding the possibility of the Viceroy visiting Deenz.
